history.proof: qsimpl time: 2 use: wand_proper_iffp. hauto use: @provable_impp_refl unfold: sepcon inv: WandAxiomatization.

exceptions.tactic: pose proof wand_proper_iffp L minL sepconL wandL Gamma minAX sepconAX wandAX as H1.
exceptions.exn: In environment L : Language minL : MinimumLanguage L sepconL : SepconLanguage L wandL : WandLanguage L Gamma : Provable L minAX : MinimumAxiomatization L Gamma sepconAX : SepconAxiomatization L Gamma wandAX : WandAxiomatization L Gamma x, y : expr The term "L" has type "Language" while it is expected to have type "expr".

exceptions.tactic: pose proof sepcon_elim1 L as H2.
exceptions.exn: In environment L : Language minL : MinimumLanguage L sepconL : SepconLanguage L wandL : WandLanguage L Gamma : Provable L minAX : MinimumAxiomatization L Gamma sepconAX : SepconAxiomatization L Gamma wandAX : WandAxiomatization L Gamma x, y : expr H : Morphisms.Proper (Morphisms.respectful (fun x y0 : expr => |-- x <--> y0) (Morphisms.respectful (fun x y0 : expr => |-- x <--> y0) (fun x y0 : expr => |-- x <--> y0))) wand The term "L" has type "Language" while it is expected to have type "expr".

original: intros x y. pose proof wand_proper_iffp L minL sepconL wandL Gamma minAX sepconAX wandAX as H1. pose proof sepcon_elim1 L as H2. rewrite <- H1. apply wand_andp.
